sentences: Tegelikult tundub see kuju veidi ebamugavalt.
Mina ei saa aru sellest kujust.
context: In Estonian, 'kuju' is a noun that refers to the shape or form of something. It can be used to describe physical shapes (like geometric forms), abstract concepts (the form of an idea), or even figures/statues. The word is in nominative singular form here.
